description: This header file defines the exported API for the Dslh Cpe Controller object, including function prototypes for creation, removal, enrollment, and initialization of the object within the DSL Home Model implementation.

methods.name: DslhCreateCpeController
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Cpe Controller object with specified container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: DslhCpecoCreate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Cpe Controller object with specified context and handles.

methods.name: DslhCpecoRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified instance of the Cpe Controller object.

methods.name: DslhCpecoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls associated objects into the Cpe Controller instance.

methods.name: DslhCpecoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Cpe Controller object instance.
